typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		sf_auto_number as string,
		sf_lead_id as string,
		sf_opportunity_id as string,
		installer_company_id as string,
		opportunity_end_date as timestamp,
		opportunity_lost_reason as string,
		description_for_stage_reason as string,
		close_date as timestamp,
		high_urgency as boolean,
		lead_platform as string,
		contract_type as string,
		lead_source as string,
		route_to_market as string,
		web_source as string,
		address_billing as string,
		address_construction as string,
		address_contact as string,
		created_date as timestamp,
		last_modified_date as timestamp,
		owner_type as string,
		search_field as string,
		bergner_and_bluma_id as string,
		description as string,
		installer_description as string,
		des_classic_id as long,
		created_by_service as string,
		last_modified_by_service as string,
		brand_id as string,
		gas_connection as boolean,
		need as string,
		urgency as string,
		current_status as string,
		current_status_reason as string,
		sf_owner_id as string,
		call_center_follow_up_date as timestamp,
		call_center_follow_up_date_counter as integer,
		external_partner_sales_object_id as string,
		purchased_from_partner as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> publicsalesobjects
source(output(
		id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		sf_auto_number as string,
		sf_lead_id as string,
		sf_opportunity_id as string,
		installer_company_id as string,
		opportunity_end_date as timestamp,
		opportunity_lost_reason as string,
		description_for_stage_reason as string,
		close_date as timestamp,
		high_urgency as boolean,
		lead_platform as string,
		contract_type as string,
		lead_source as string,
		route_to_market as string,
		web_source as string,
		address_billing as string,
		address_construction as string,
		address_contact as string,
		created_date as timestamp,
		last_modified_date as timestamp,
		owner_type as string,
		search_field as string,
		bergner_and_bluma_id as string,
		description as string,
		installer_description as string,
		des_classic_id as long,
		created_by_service as string,
		last_modified_by_service as string,
		brand_id as string,
		gas_connection as boolean,
		need as string,
		urgency as string,
		current_status as string,
		current_status_reason as string,
		sf_owner_id as string,
		call_center_follow_up_date as timestamp,
		call_center_follow_up_date_counter as integer,
		external_partner_sales_object_id as string,
		purchased_from_partner as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> factsalesobjects
publicsalesobjects, factsalesobjects join(publicsalesobjects@id == factsalesobjects@id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(factsalesobjects@id)),
	updateIf(notEquals(publicsalesobjects@last_modified_date,factsalesobjects@last_modified_date))) ~> MergeAlterRow
MergeAlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		sf_auto_number as string,
		sf_lead_id as string,
		sf_opportunity_id as string,
		installer_company_id as string,
		opportunity_end_date as timestamp,
		opportunity_lost_reason as string,
		description_for_stage_reason as string,
		close_date as timestamp,
		high_urgency as boolean,
		lead_platform as string,
		contract_type as string,
		lead_source as string,
		route_to_market as string,
		web_source as string,
		address_billing as string,
		address_construction as string,
		address_contact as string,
		created_date as timestamp,
		last_modified_date as timestamp,
		owner_type as string,
		search_field as string,
		bergner_and_bluma_id as string,
		description as string,
		installer_description as string,
		des_classic_id as long,
		created_by_service as string,
		last_modified_by_service as string,
		brand_id as string,
		gas_connection as boolean,
		need as string,
		urgency as string,
		current_status as string,
		current_status_reason as string,
		sf_owner_id as string,
		call_center_follow_up_date as timestamp,
		call_center_follow_up_date_counter as integer,
		external_partner_sales_object_id as string,
		purchased_from_partner as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_id = publicsalesobjects@customer_id,
		each(match(true()))
	)) ~> sink1
